item.title: Ferina add a quote by Paulo Coelho from The Alcemist
item.description: "Fate itâ€™s what you have always wanted to accomplish. Everyone, when they are young, knows what their destination is. At that point in their lives, everything is clear and everything is possible. They are not afraid to dream, and to yearn for everything they would like to see happen to them in their lives. But, as time passes, a mysterious force begins to convince them that it will be impossible for them to realize their dreams or fate." -- Paulo Coelho from The Alcemist

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "Science is what you know, philosophy is what you don't know" -- Bertrand Russell

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Kalian boleh maju dalam pelajaran, mungkin mencapai deretan gelar kesarjanaan apa saja, tapi tanpa mencintai sastra, kalian tinggal hanya hewan yang pandai." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Ferina add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Kau akan berhasil dalam setiap pelajaran, dan kau harus percaya akan berhasil, dan berhasillah kau; anggap semua pelajaran mudah, dan semua akan jadi mudah; jangan takut pada pelajaran apa pun, karena ketakutan itu sendiri kebodohan awal yang akan membodohkan semua" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer
